Reviews.Title: Motorola Entice W766 Verizon Cell Phone
Reviews.Author: john p brannan
Reviews.Content: Im very happy with the service in buying, very fast and excellent shipping,and the same new phone replaces my old Entice that finally wore out BUT the new battery refuses to work in the new phone even being fully charged and properly inserted. So Im having to use my old battery in my new phone! Not happy with this. Could a new battery be sent to me? I would greatly appreciate it! Thankyou, John b.

Reviews.Title: Good service
Reviews.Author: Susie Crotts "AuntieSuz"
Reviews.Content: Have had this particular phone several years but mine has been dropped and is kinda "beat up" so very happy to find a new one of the same model!
